meanings.definition: Not conscious; lacking awareness or perception.
meanings.sent1: The nonconscious mind controls many of our actions without us realizing it.
meanings.sent2: She walked around in a nonconscious state, not noticing anything around her.
meanings.sent3: The nonconscious alarm clock decided to stop working on Monday mornings as a prank.
meanings.sent4: His nonconscious fear of spiders made him jump at the sight of a tiny bug.
meanings.sent5: The nonconscious influence of her favorite song stayed with her all day.

meanings.definition: Existing or functioning without conscious awareness.
meanings.sent1: The nonconscious process of breathing keeps us alive without us having to think about it.
meanings.sent2: The nonconscious movements of the dancers on stage mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent3: The nonconscious decision to wear mismatched socks led to some funny looks at the office.
meanings.sent4: Her nonconscious intuition guided her to make the right choice without hesitation.
meanings.sent5: The nonconscious rhythm of the rain against the window was soothing.
